workoutA.name: Barbell Bench Press
workoutA.description: Lie on a flat bench and push the barbell from your chest until your arms are extended.

workoutA.name: Incline Dumbbell Press
workoutA.description: Lie on an incline bench and push the dumbbells toward the ceiling until your arms are extended.

workoutA.name: Cable Crossover
workoutA.description: Pull the cables across your body until your hands meet in front of your chest.

workoutA.name: Skull Crusher
workoutA.description: Lie on a bench, lower the bar to your forehead, then extend your elbows to lift it back up.

workoutA.name: Dips
workoutA.description: Lower your body by bending your elbows, then push back up to the starting position.

workoutA.name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
workoutA.description: Sit down and push the dumbbells overhead until your arms are fully extended.

workoutB.name: Barbell Squat
workoutB.description: Lower your hips until your thighs are parallel to the floor, then stand back up.

workoutB.name: Leg Press
workoutB.description: Push the platform with your legs until your knees are nearly extended, then return slowly.

workoutB.name: Leg Extension
workoutB.description: Sit and extend your legs upward until they are straight.

workoutB.name: Leg Curl
workoutB.description: Curl your legs downward against the resistance of the machine.

workoutB.name: Lunges
workoutB.description: Step forward and lower your body until your back knee nearly touches the floor.

workoutB.name: Glute Bridge
workoutB.description: Lie on your back and lift your hips, squeezing your glutes at the top.

workoutC.name: Lat Pulldown
workoutC.description: Grab the bar with a wide grip and pull it down to your upper chest.

workoutC.name: Barbell Bent-Over Row
workoutC.description: Bend forward and pull the barbell toward your abdomen.

workoutC.name: One-Arm Dumbbell Row
workoutC.description: Support one knee on a bench and pull the dumbbell up toward your torso.

workoutC.name: Barbell Bicep Curl
workoutC.description: Curl the barbell up until it reaches shoulder height, then lower it slowly.

workoutC.name: Hammer Curl
workoutC.description: Hold the dumbbells with a neutral grip and curl them up simultaneously.

workoutC.name: Face Pull
workoutC.description: Pull the rope attachment toward your face, keeping your elbows high.
